nodes.text: Muchi was an adolescent female rancor owned by Jabba the Hutt. At some point, she was captured by Zygerrian slavers and taken to the Mid Rim planet Ord Mantell. In around 19 BBY, Jabba's majordomo, Bib Fortuna, hired the former Jedi informant Cid to return the rancor to them. Cid, in turn, hired Clone Force 99 to complete the job. Muchi was released by Omega, and returned to Bib Fortuna, who cared about the rancor and called her his "sweet girl."
